definitions.body: breath of God as hot wind kindling a flame Is 30:33; as destroying wind 2Sa 22:16 = Ps 18:16, Job 4:9; as cold wind producing ice Job 32:8, Job 33:4.

breath of man 1Ki 17:17, Is 42:5, Job 27:3, Da 10:7; breath of life [[נשׁמת חיים]] Ge 2:7 (J); cf. [[נִשְׁמַת רוּחַ]] [[חַיִּים]] Ge 7:22 (J); as breathed in by God it is God's breath in man Job 34:14, Job 36:4; and is characteristic of man [[אדם אשׁר נשׁמה באפו]] Is 2:22 man in whose nostrils is but a breath (late gloss).
syn. [[נפשׁ כָּל נְשָׁמָה]] every breathing thing De 20:16, Jos 11:11, Jos 11:14, 1Ki 15:29; [[כָּל־הַנְּשָׁמָה]] Jos 10:40, Ps 150:6; [[נְשָׁמוֹת]] Is 57:16.
